QuestData.Title: Gordok Guards
QuestData.Description: With the nearby ogres dealt with, we should take the offensive and press our attack into their territory.$B$BThe Gordok ogres are the head of the Gordunni clan, ruling them from the ruins now called Dire Maul. They are stronger than the lesser Gordunni, but I have no doubt you can handle them, $n. They won't know what hit them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 Gordok Enforcers and 6 Gordok Ogre-Mages.
QuestData.RewardText: Wonderful! Everything's going according to plan. Lady Shandris will be pleased.
